Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a picture showing two students trying to communicate over a long distance.
The student can illustrate a device, like a string telephone, showing how it uses sound to send information between the two students.
The student can demonstrate how the device connects the two students, ensuring the communication travels along the string.
The student can include the key parts of the string telephone device such as the cups/cans and the string between them.
The student can be sure to show that the device only uses the provided materials in its construction.
The student can show the string telephone device in action, emphasizing the movement of sound for communication purposes.
The student can add notes or labels in the drawing explaining how the device helps in communicating over distances using sound.
